other_tests.findings: Demonstrated BCC with infiltrative and morpheaform features.
Demonstrated one new extrathoracic lymph node and slight enlargement of another; other lymph nodes were stable.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Overall, imiquimod and acitretin have proven to be good palliative care, with marked healing of many cutaneous lesions.

other_tests.findings: Significant right arm edema, multiple erythematous papules, nodules, ulcers, and a 3.0-cm firm nonmovable mass in the right axilla.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After 7 months of treatment, many smaller cutaneous metastatic foci decreased in diameter and depth; however, an ulcerative plaque did not resolve.
